statements: UPDATE InfluencerContent SET influencer_name = 'Alice', content = 'New post' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InfluencerContent SET content = 'Updated post', creation_date = NOW(), influencer_name = 'Bob' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE InfluencerContent SET content = 'New content' WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE InfluencerContent SET creation_date = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE influencer_content SET content_description = 'New summer collection' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_marketing_strategies SET end_date = '2023-01-01', strategy_description = 'Holiday promotion' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE influencer_content SET content_description = 'New exciting content' WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND content_type = 'Video';

UPDATE brand_marketing_strategies SET strategy_description = 'Updated marketing strategy' WHERE brand_id = 456 AND strategy_type = 'Social Media' AND start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
UPDATE Influencers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Content SET content_url = 'http://example.com/image.jpg', posted_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencers SET influencer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE influencer_id=1;
UPDATE Brands SET industry='Fashion', brand_name='Fashionista' WHERE brand_id=2;
UPDATE influencer_content SET content='Updated post content' WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-556642440000';
UPDATE brands SET website='www.updated-website.com', industry='Healthcare' WHERE brand_name = 'BrandXYZ';
UPDATE influencer_content SET post_date = '2022-11-30 08:00:00' WHERE influencer_id = '78ab3d59-f45f-4fd0-b3f4-2306b65f10e0';
UPDATE brands SET website = 'http://www.newwebsite.com', industry = 'Technology', brand_name = 'New Tech Brand' WHERE id = 'c7395b51-9b1b-4974-adf1-5bdf7ebbbf70';
UPDATE Content SET post_date='2022-09-15' WHERE content_id=12345;
UPDATE Analytics SET views=1000, likes=500 WHERE content_id=54321;
UPDATE Influencer SET influencer_followers = 5000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Content SET post_date = '2022-01-15', brand_id = 2 WHERE content_id = 3;
